quotes: In 1999, he was elected as the mayor of the Beyoğlu district.
His biggest political step came in 2004. Kadir Topbaş ran for the top job: Mayor of Istanbul.
He won the election on March 28, 2004.
In November 2007, he became a co-president of United Cities and Local Governments.
Kadir Topbaş was re-elected as the Mayor of Istanbul in 2009.
In 2009, he also became the President of the Union of Municipalities of Turkey.
During some public events in 2013, he talked about city development.
He resigned as Mayor of Istanbul on September 22, 2017.
Kadir Topbaş Chowk in Lahore, Pakistan. This square was named after Kadir Topbaş and opened on March 12, 2012.
In November 2020, he was hospitalized because he had COVID-19.
Sadly, Kadir Topbaş passed away on February 13, 2021.
Order of Cultural Merit, South Korea, 12 September 2014, Seoul
